snippet: The Whigs of the XXIIId, Senatorial District, composed of Tioga, Cortlandt and Broome Counties, have nominated Hon. G. H. BARSTOW, of Tioga, for the Senato. In the XIVth District, the Whigs have nominated GEORGE SHERMAN, Esq., of Essex County, as ...
lead_paragraph: The Whigs of the XXIIId, Senatorial District, composed of Tioga, Cortlandt and Broome Counties, have nominated Hon. G. H. BARSTOW, of Tioga, for the Senato. In the XIVth District, the Whigs have nominated GEORGE SHERMAN, Esq., of Essex County, as their candidate for Senator.
